summary:
This mod can allow your teammates become stronger Automatically as long as you level up.
There are three levelup-directions, onehanded, twohanded and mage, for you to choose from.
You can let 6 NPC to level up along with you, not only your teammate, but also someone far away from you.
descriptionHtml:
*****************Description******************
This mod can allow your teammates become stronger Automatically as long as you level up.
There are three levelup-directions, onehanded, twohanded and mage, for you to choose from.
You can let 6 NPC to level up along with you, not only your teammate, but also someone far away from you. 
*In this vertion, the values your teammates got when you level up are set to be random but with a certain number, in order to make the game more interesting 
*You can only become stronger when you level up.
V1.8.1
fixed a bug

V1.8
This new vertion can save your setting for the chosen Autolevel-up-teammate.
Even After U Close the Game.
If you want to reset the Autolevel-up-teammate, just do the two steps below again.
The latested chose teammate will replace the former one.
*If you want your teammate as both caster or warrier at the same time,
 JUST set the same teammate as both caster and warrier .
In this case, you can let one NPC grow as onehanded warrier, twohandedwarrier and caster at the same time.

****************************************************
step1 : press console (~), select needed ped via left mouse button, close console.
step2: press Num 8\\9 to let the selected NPC grow as a twohanded-warrior.
          press Num 5\\6 to let the selected NPC grow as a onehanded soldier.
                              (both of them will have their marksman skill leveled up.)
          press Num 2\\3 to let the selected NPC grow as a powerful mage.

       
You can change the NPC by pressing the same Num button again, of course after selecting the new NPC.

******************Installation******************


1. Script Dragon files are included in my files already.
2. Or you can Install Script Dragon from the below link
  http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1292671-rel-script-dragon/page__st__20
3. Place autolevelup.asi and AutoLevelUp.ini along with the other two files into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. Not the Data folder.

******************Uninstalling******************
Delete autolevelup.asi and AutoLevelUp.ini

******************Credit******************
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon.
author: Andy Stark
